name: MULTICUBE (Raul Moreno Tamayo)
description:
<<EPILEPSY WARNING>>

A collection of very simple games that become extremely difficult when paired together. Can you survive for 60 seconds?

Made (almost) entirely with cubes.

CONTROLS: WASD / Arrow Keys, LMB / Space, Mouse pointer

Check out the downloadable version for Fullscreen support.

Music:

Edm Detection Mode by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4987-edm-detection-mode
